title: News24.com | Lockdown: Calls for calm after officer, guard arrested for allegedly killing man in Vosloorus
description: Ekurhuleni Mayor Mzwandile Masina has called for calm after an Ekhurhuleni Metro Police Department officer and a security guard were arrested for allegedly killing a man and injuring four children aged between five and 11.
content:
Ekurhuleni Mayor Mzwandile Masina has called for calm after an Ekhurhuleni Metro Police Department (EMPD) officer and a security guard were arrested for allegedly killing a man and injuring four children aged between five and 11.
The man - who was identified… [+2603 chars]
